column2: an A.M. Eatery////It was Saturday morning in downtown Houston so without a doubt there was a 45 min wait.  No biggie
column3: got on the list and waited.  The food was fantastic
column4: the coffee good the milk ICE cold.  During the wait I read several reviews
column5: I have to say the Pot Pie peaked my interest so I went for to
column6: it was so delicious.  Light flaky pastry
column7: sausage gravy it was perfect.  Service is great
column8: staff knows the menu and answered lots of questions thoroughly and confidently.
